abstract: Background: Chromosome karyotype analysis is crucial for diagnosing hereditary diseases, yet detecting structural abnormalities remains challenging. While AI has shown promise in medical imaging, its effectiveness varies across modalities …

title: Value of Ultrasonography in Diagnosis of Acute Appendicitis: A Cross-Sectional Prospective Study

abstract: Background: Abdominal ultrasonography is an essential imaging modality in diagnosing patients with acute appendicitis. Its major advantages include high diagnostic accuracy, availability, affordability, and excellent safety pro le relative to …
